synonyms: vṛndāvanera—of Vṛndāvana; sampad—the opulence; dekha—see; puṣpa-kisalaya—a few flowers and twigs; giri-dhātu—some minerals from the hills; śikhi-piccha—some peacock feathers; guñjā-phala-maya—some guñjā-phala.
translation: "As far as Vṛndāvana's opulence is concerned, it consists of a few flowers and twigs, some minerals from the hills, a few peacock feathers and the plant known as guñjā.
